title: Free design software - Blender
description:
Free Full Featured 3D Modeling Creation Suite

for Windows Computers

Blender is the free open source 3D content creation suite that provides a revolutionary non-overlapping and non-blocking UI that delivers an unsurpassed work flow. Blender offers a full range of 3D object types including polygon meshes, NURBS surfaces, bezier and B-spline curves, metaballs, and vector fonts. Blender is quick to learn and easy to use!

Brought to you by


where you can find other software that is safe and clean from spyware. Also highly recommended is Crystal Space - a free cross-platform software development kit for realtime 3D graphics: 


Operating Systems:

Windows 98, ME, 2000, XP or Vista

Blender is also available for


Mac OS X 10.2 and later
Linux 2.2.5 i386
Linux 2.3.2 PPC
FreeBSD 6.2 i386
Irix 6.5 mips3
Solaris 2.8 sparc
